title: Of Land and Sea: The Untold Story of The Little Mermaid
description: What happens when two princesses fall in love with the same prince?Helena of Kamdren has always believed in mermaids, but she had no idea about the sacrifices that the mysterious maiden Coralie made to be with her betrothed. Learn the untold story of the little mermaid who lost her chance at love and the woman who gained it in her place in this retelling of Hans Christian Andersen's classic fairy tale.
author: Lisa Dawn
